project_descr: Articulating Governance and Local Development in Indonesia (ART GOLD Indonesia/AGI). Global programme aimed at harnessing partnerships to generate development results

outputs.output_descr: - Equip provincial offices, enabling team to function; - weekly plenary meetings for Provincial Working Group (PWG); - establish multi-stakeholder of PWG; - formulation and finalization of AGI consolidated workplan at international, national and provincial levels, within the framework of local planning cycle; - support activities identified by PWG; - Identification and implementation of Quick Impact Projects in Nusa Tenggara Timur.

- Finalization of project document; - National Coordination Committee meetings; - participations of Government of Indonesia/International Experts in International seminars on Decentralization and Regional Development; - Workshops on consolidated workplan; - resource mobilisation mission to Europe.

- Participation of Art Gold Indonesia (AGI) staff and Government of Indonesia in ART international activities; - Support the identification of the most suitable technical assistance in order to elaborate Working Plans and strategies, particularly in Local Economic Development, UNIVERSITAS, and South-South Cooperation; Support to missions and study tours of the Indonesian national and Provincial authorities to partner territories in Europe or elsewhere for knowledge sharing, best-experiences sharing, technical exchange, resource-mobilization, etc.

project_title: articulating governance and local development in indones
